paper_abstract: We study the approximability of MAX ONES when the number of variable occurrences is bounded by a constant. For conservative constraint languages (i.e., when the unary relations are included) we give a complete classification when the number of occurrences is three or more and a partial classification when the bound is two. For the non-conservative case we prove that it is either trivial or equivalent to the corresponding conservative problem under polynomial-time many-one reductions.
paper_title: Approximability of bounded occurrence Max Ones
